summary:
مشاهدة وتحميل فيلم Avengers: Age of Ultron 2015 All BluRay مترجم

تدور احداث قصة فيلم الاكشن والاثاره والخيال العلمي "Avengers:...
caption:
مشاهدة وتحميل فيلم Avengers: Age of Ultron 2015 All BluRay مترجم

تدور احداث قصة فيلم الاكشن والاثاره والخيال العلمي “Avengers: Age of Ultron 2015 ” المنتقمون: عصر ألترون “ عندما يحاول الرجل الحديدي (توني ستارك) إعادة إحياء مشروع (حفظ السلام) ، تنحرف الأمور عن مسارها حين يتسبب في خلق ذكاء اصطناعي مدمر يمكنه التخطيط بنفسه ، ومحاولة تطبيق معاييره الفلسفية الجهنمية على البشر ، ويصبح مصير استمرار الحياة على كوكب الأرض معتمدا على نجاح أعتى الرجال الخارقين مثل الرجل الحديدي ، وكابتن أميركا ، والعملاق الأخضر ، والأرملة السوداء ، وهوك ، في مواجهة الذكاء الشرير (ألترون) ، والآن على فريق المنتقمين أن يواجهوا هذا الشر .

title: Re: Avengers 4 trailer
body:
The first Infinity War trailer was the Avengers reciting Fury’s “Idea” speech. The first Avengers 4 trailer is going to be similar, but it’s going to be Tony’s speech to Loki instead. And to hammer it in, with the “we’re going to avenge it” line, that vo is going to be over a montage of the snap.

It sets up the two movie as being reflections of each other, but also continuing the story on from the end of IW.

reblog.comment:
The first Infinity War trailer was the Avengers reciting Fury’s “Idea” speech. The first Avengers 4 trailer is going to be similar, but it’s going to be Tony’s speech to Loki instead. And to hammer it in, with the “we’re going to avenge it” line, that vo is going to be over a montage of the snap.

It sets up the two movie as being reflections of each other, but also continuing the story on from the end of IW.

It sets up the two movie as being reflections of each other, but also continuing the story on from the end of IW.

The first Infinity War trailer was the Avengers reciting Fury’s “Idea” speech. The first Avengers 4 trailer is going to be similar, but it’s going to be Tony’s speech to Loki instead. And to hammer it in, with the “we’re going to avenge it” line, that vo is going to be over a montage of the snap.

It sets up the two movie as being reflections of each other, but also continuing the story on from the end of IW.

summary: What is up with marvel recently? You just sit and wait calmly for the new Avengers 4 trailer to arrive and instead they cancel...
body:
What is up with marvel recently? You just sit and wait calmly for the new Avengers 4 trailer to arrive and instead they cancel nearly every Netflix show and confirm (well, the Russo brothers) that Loki actually died.

That’s not what I signed up for!

reblog.comment:
What is up with marvel recently? You just sit and wait calmly for the new Avengers 4 trailer to arrive and instead they cancel nearly every Netflix show and confirm (well, the Russo brothers) that Loki actually died.

That’s not what I signed up for!

That’s not what I signed up for!

What is up with marvel recently? You just sit and wait calmly for the new Avengers 4 trailer to arrive and instead they cancel nearly every Netflix show and confirm (well, the Russo brothers) that Loki actually died.

That’s not what I signed up for!

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: Clintasha Drabbles (Clintasha Advent 2018)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2zz36Uu

by CricketScribbles

25 days of Clintasha drabbles as a countdown to Christmas. Includes: hurt/comfort, angst, (no character death!), romance, holidays, friends-to-lovers, enemies-to-lovers, domestic fluff.

Written for Clintasha Advent 2018 on tumblr

(Rating subject to change)

Words: 328, Chapters: 1/25, Language: English

  • Characters: Clint Barton, Natasha Romanoff
  • Relationships: Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov

title: One Last Kiss - Thor
body:
Pairing: Thor x Reader

Warnings: Angst. Death. Sad stuff. 

A/N: This was written for @barnesrogersvstheworld Marvel kiss challenge. My prompt was a kiss in a Thunderstorm. I had this whole visual in my head when I requested the prompt and this depressing drabble is what came out. Sorry, Thor.

***

You never saw it coming.

That was so cliché. How many times had you heard someone say that in your life? But it was true. You didn’t see a thing.

As the last opponent fell, you turned to Thor with a happy smile. His gaze immediately found you as was his habit after any battle. His joyful expression mirrored your own for a brief moment. By the time you registered his smile slipping away and the panic in his eyes it was too late.  

White hot pain seared through you. You gasped and fell to your knees, the impact sending another wave of agony ripping across your middle. Thor yelled your name, the agony in it making your heart break. You ached to respond, to call for him in return but the pain… Your hands clutched your belly, hot sticky blood covering them in moments.

An angry rain began to fall nipping at your skin as you collapsed to the ground. Your god yelled and screamed in his fury. Lightning crashed from the sky striking the man that would dare take you from him. Thor lifted you from the ground and cradled you in his lap. Tears mixed with the rain to run down his face.

Trembling fingers wiped the blood from your lips. “You’ll be all right, my love. Just stay with me, Y/N.”

You lifted a hand and laid it on his. “It’s okay, Thor. You’ll be fine without me. I promise.”

“No, no, no. Please.” His hands ran over you looking for a way to hold you, to fix you. He was full on sobbing now and you wished there was something you could do to make this easier for him.

“Kiss me.”

Trembling lips brushed against yours. “I love you.”

You smiled against his mouth. “And I love you, my prince.” Your eyelids fluttered closed as you enjoyed the feel of one last kiss from your god.

Marvel:  @evyiione @gabriellewritermua @reblogger-not-a-blogger 

All the Things:  @swanky-batman @rissyrapp20 @startrekkingaroundasgard @spooookyscary @taylordrunkonwhiskey @thewolf-and-thesheep

blog.name: themarvelouswhale
blog.title: Loki is the owner of my heart♥️
blog.description: Marvel Scenarios | Feel free to send in your requests! | Masterlist

body:
I Love You

Pairing: Bucky Barnes x Reader

You and Bucky have been dating for about 3 months and you were absolutely head over heels for each other. The other Avengers always cringed when seeing the both of you together because you could not keep your hands off of each other.

But what can you say, you loved the man so much, although he may not have always done the right things, you loved him for who he was.

However, neither of you have yet to say those three words to the other partner. Although you loved Bucky a lot, you just didn’t have the courage to say those words, or so you thought.

-

One day, you and your boyfriend were in your room, laying on your bed, cuddling while watching movies, just another normal night but you loved every moment of it because of who you were spending it with.

“Doll, why are you with me?” Bucky asked, breaking the peaceful silence between the two of you. You got startled, “What?”

Your lover sighed, repeating himself once more, ”Why are you with me? You deserve better, I am just a mess…” You frowned at Bucky’s words, “Bucky…” You just hoped that one day Bucky would see how wonderful he is.

“I have hurt and killed so many people in my life and I may harm you anytime… I just don’t want to hurt you. I don’t deserve you.“ 

After he finished, you sat up, Bucky following after. You faced your lover, gently cupping his face with one of your hands. “Bucky, you won’t hurt me.” You comforted. Bucky placed his hand gently over yours, “But what if I do? I won’t be able to forgive myself.” You could see tears welling in his eyes, your heart broke at the sight, you controlled yourself from attacking him with hugs and kisses, you just wanted him to love himself like how you loved him.

You smiled softly, “Look Bucky, I just know you won’t hurt me. To me, you’re perfect in every way possible. I love you so much, I can’t bear the thought of not being with you.”

After realising what you said, the hand that was holding Bucky’s cheek was now placed over your mouth.

Bucky stared with you, his pale blue eyes were filled with happiness and love as a smile grew on his face. “You… love me?” He questioned, not believing what he just heard, although he knew that you loved him, it felt nice to hear it coming from you. He felt loved and wanted.

You nodded, trying to ignore the heat that was rushing to your cheeks, in disbelief that those words would slip out of your mouth. Not that you minded, but you didn’t know you had the ability to.

Suddenly, Bucky held your hand that was placed over your mouth and replaced it with his lips. Bucky’s kisses would always make you go weak without fail, his beard lightly tickling you in a pleasant way and his soft lips just felt so good. The kiss was so gentle, just like how Bucky would always treat you.

Slowly, he pulled away, you frowned at the loss of contact. “I…. I… I love you too…” He stuttered. You smiled at how cute he was and not to mention the butterflies in your stomach after hearing those words coming out of your lover’s mouth.

The both of you went back to cuddling and watching the movie. Smiles plastered on both of your faces. You felt Bucky kiss the top of your head as you hummed in satisfaction. 

You were happy that you finally took another step in your relationship, your love for Bucky was getting stronger each second.
